nodes.description: 周一早晨在Chaman Levies总部附近发生爆炸
nodes.support_text: A police officer was killed and 18 others including four police personnel wounded in an explosion near Levies Headquarters in Chaman on Monday morning.

nodes.description: 自杀式袭击者骑摩托车冲撞DPO Sajid Khan的巡逻车队
nodes.support_text: The suicide bomber targeted DPO Sajid Khan’s convoy, killing him and injuring over 20 people. The vehicle of DPO was badly damaged in the explosion.

nodes.description: 爆炸导致DPO Sajid Khan死亡，其车辆严重损毁
nodes.support_text: DPO Chaman Sajid Khan Mohmand was killed in the bombing at Eidgah in Chaman.

nodes.description: 袭击造成包括4名警员在内的至少20人受伤
nodes.support_text: 18 others including four police personnel wounded...injuring over 20 people.

nodes.description: 警方确认袭击为自杀式爆炸，发现袭击者头部和腿部
nodes.support_text: According to the security sources, head and legs of the bombers have been found.

nodes.description: 伤员及DPO遗体由直升机转运至医院
nodes.support_text: Body of the DPO and wounded people have been shifted to hospital on board a helicopter.

nodes.description: 消息来源陈述炸弹客的驾驶行为
nodes.support_text: the sources said the bomber was riding a motorbike which he rammed into the DPO’s vehicle

edges.support_text: DPO Chaman Sajid Khan Mohmand was killed in the bombing at Eidgah in Chaman.
18 others including four police personnel wounded...injuring over 20 people.
The suicide bomber targeted DPO Sajid Khan’s convoy, killing him and injuring over 20 people.
According to the security sources, head and legs of the bombers have been found.
Body of the DPO and wounded people have been shifted to hospital on board a helicopter.
